pages.title: Star of Forgiveness
pages.text: You have killed a $(turtle). That's terrible, but you have accepted what you did and you are ready to get back to the right track. This is the item for you. Consuming this item will grant you a return to the Proper Turtlemancer life. Just... Don't ruin it again, okey?

pages.title: Forgiveness Ritual
pages.description: This ritual will make the $(item)Nether Star of Forgiveness$().
